Title: Relates to providing compensation for the loss of a fetus
Summary: Relates to providing compensation for the loss of a fetus; includes the loss of a fetus in the schedule loss of use; provides compensation shall be for 312 weeks.
LawCode: Amd ยง15, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to providing compensation for the loss of a fetus
